original_text: And he will appoint for himself commanders of thousands and commanders of fifties, and some to plow his ground and to reap his harvest, and to make his implements of war and the equipment of his chariots.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 아들들을 천부장과 오십부장을 삼을 것이며 자기 밭을 갈게 하고 자기 추수를 하게 할 것이며 자기 무기와 병거의 장비도 만들게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he will appoint for himself
and some to plow his ground
and to make his implements of war
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 전쟁 무기를 만들 사람들

sentences.original_text: and the equipment of his chariots
